alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ozaukee and east central Washington Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1008 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jackson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Jackson, Saukville, Keowns, and Kirchhayn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 43 between mile markers 88 and 97. Interstate 41 between mile markers 61 and 62. U.S. Highway 45 between mile markers 61 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
